      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Command getCommandFromMenu(int menuID)
      Used to get the command referenced by the last menu using the provided integer.
      CommandLevel getCommandLevel()
      Gives the user the current CommandLevel.
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> getMenu()
      Provides the menu corresponding to the current CommandLevel in the form of a List where each new String is a new line.

      Gives the user the previous CommandLevel, used primarily for the back function in menus.

      Prints the menu from the getMenu() method to stdout.

      Used to change the CommandLevel, this will be mainly used by Commands.

      • getCommandFromMenu

        public Command getCommandFromMenu(int menuID)
        Used to get the command referenced by the last menu using the provided integer.
        Parameters:
        menuID - The integer that was used to reference a command.
        Returns:
        The command referenced by that ID or null if it doesn't exist.
